attributes.action: Require external speedometers to be fitted to all new vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If every vehicle carried an external display showing their current speed, drivers would be less likely to exceed the speed limits, knowing that police and every other road user, armed with a camera, could provide evidence against them.
I believe that speeders think they can get away with it only through others' ignorance of their true speed.
Such a move would render speed-cameras, humps and other, sometimes bizarre, traffic-calming measures unnecessary. Thus saving administration and maintenance money and returning the roads for law-abiding users to use in a dignified manner.
